name: Kaze Kingdom
description:
Final year university project focusing on experimental games.  

Kaze Kingdom is an isometric 3D arcade puzzle-action game. Control a runaway tornado rampaging through different locations around the world. Start off as a small gust of wind, build it up by scooping up trash and debris, grow little by little increasing in size.

From collecting chairs to people to cars to even buildings, becoming a full-scale tornado leaving only destruction behind. The tornado will become so uncontrollable that changing its direction will be harder almost having a mind of its own.
